lead_paragraph: Travis Zajac had a goal and three assists, and the Devils scored five times in the first period en route to a 6-3 win over Ottawa, which they have beaten six times in their last eight meetings.
snippet: Travis Zajac had a goal and three assists, and the Devils scored five times in the first period en route to a 6-3 win over Ottawa, which they have beaten six times in their last eight meetings.

headline.main: Devils, With 5 Early Goals, Continue Mastery of Senators
headline.print_headline: Devils, With 5 Early Goals, Continue Mastery of Senators

abstract: NHL Roundup; New Jersey Devils defeat Ottawa Senators, 6-3; other hockey scores noted.
